com.google.i18n.pseudolocalization.message

Class SimpleMessage.Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.i18n.pseudolocalization.message.SimpleMessage.Context
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VisitorContext
    Enclosing class:
    SimpleMessage

    protected class SimpleMessage.Context
extends Object
implements VisitorContext
    A VisitorContext which can manipulate the fragments in this message.
